variant.question: Fuel loaded onto an aeroplane is 15 400 kg but is erroneously entered into the load and trim sheet as 14 500 kg. This error is not detected by the flight crew but they will notice that:

options.text: speed at un-stick will be higher than expected.
V1 will be reached sooner than expected.
the aeroplane will rotate much earlier than expected.

variant.question: An additional baggage container is loaded into the aft cargo compartment but is not entered into the load and trim sheet. The aeroplane will be heavier than expected and calculated take-off safety speeds:

options.text: are unaffected but V1 will be increased.

variant.question: An additional baggage container is loaded into the aft cargo compartment but is not entered into the load and trim sheet.The aeroplane will be heavier than expected and calculated take-off safety speeds:

options.text: are unaffected but V~1~ will be increased

variant.question: An additional baggage container is loaded into the aft cargo compartment but is not entered into the load and trim sheet.The aeroplane will be heavier than expected and calculated take-off safety speeds:

options.text: are unaffected but V1 will be increased

variant.question:
A pilot has finished the pre-planning
 Shortly before departure an additional container with a mass of 3 500 kg of traffic load is accepted
 The pilot forgets to calculate the new performance values of the aircraft
 Take-off and climb is accomplished without any problems
 How will the performance of the aircraft due to the additional mass be affected?

options.text: Rate of climb and range will be decreased.
Fuel flow and endurance will be reduced.
Angle of climb and obstacle clearance will be improved.
Fuel flow and specific range will be increased.

variant.question:

The traffic load is 770 kg

The medium range twin jet transport is scheduled to operate from a departure airfield where conditions limit the Take-off Mass to 65 050 kg. The destination airfield has a performance limited Landing Mass of 54 500 kg. The Dry Operating Mass is 34 900 kg. Loading data is as follows:

The aircraft may be safely operated with the stated Traffic and Fuel Load.
The aircraft is Zero Fuel Mass limited and the Traffic Load must be reduced to 14 170 kg.
The aircraft may be safely operated with an additional 200 kg of Traffic Load.

options.text: a reduction in the rate of climb and the range
an improved angle of climb and increased obstacle clearance
an increase in the fuel flow and specific range
a reduction in the fuel flow and endurance
